title: Product Researcher for E-Commerce
job_overview:
As a Product Researcher, you will play a critical role in identifying new product opportunities that align with our storeâ€™s vision. You will be responsible for evaluating product trends, analyzing competitors, and working closely with our marketing and supply chain teams to ensure that we provide the best products on the market.

The ideal candidate will have prior experience working with e-commerce brands or online stores and will be able to demonstrate their success in sourcing and researching high-demand products that drive sales and customer engagement.

How to Apply:
To apply for this position, please include examples of e-commerce brands or stores you have worked with in the past. Specifically, highlight your product research work and the impact it had on those businesses. Applications without this information will not be considered.

We are looking for someone who has proven experience driving product success in the e-commerce space, so please make sure to show us what you've done, how you did it, and the results that followed!
